summary: Nvidia is an American tech company that designs powerful computer brain-like parts called GPUs, which help with super-fast computing and creating realistic images for video games and movies. They also make chips for phones and cars. Nvidia is a leader in AI technology, helping computers learn and think like humans. The company is worth a lot of money, recently reaching a value of over $1 trillion. They almost bought another big tech company, Arm, but the deal fell through.
title: Nvidia
